onMarkerReached(android.media.AudioRecor.Description: Called on the listener to notify it that the previously set marker has been reached by the recording head.

onPeriodicNotification(android.media.Aud.Description: Called on the listener to periodically notify it that the record head has reached a multiple of the notification period.

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an AudioRecord has reached a notification marker set by @B_android#media#AudioRecord#setNotificationMarkerPosition_E@ or for periodic updates on the progress of the record head, as set by @B_android#media#AudioRecord#setPositionNotificationPeriod_E@.
